name: @dashi/browser-extension
description: DASHI - Decentralized Anonymous Sovereign Health Identity Browser Extension

scripts.build: yarn sync-zk && tsc && vite build && cp src/content/injected-script.js dist/src/content/
scripts.build:firefox: yarn sync-zk && cross-env BROWSER=firefox vite build && cp src/content/injected-script.js dist/src/content/
scripts.build:chrome: yarn sync-zk && cross-env BROWSER=chrome vite build && cp src/content/injected-script.js dist/src/content/
scripts.compile-integration-test: tsc scripts/test-extension-integration.ts --outDir scripts --module esnext --moduleResolution bundler --target es2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
